item.title: How can blockchain be used as a database to store data?
item.description:
How can blockchain be used as a database to store data?

Answer (1 of 4): Blockchains, by design and definition, defines a specific type of database... they are a write once read only database. What that means is, they are designed to be only ever created, and not edited or deleted. This makes them immutable (ie unchangeable), and historically accurate ...

item.title: Bitcoin is the Automobile 'Menace' of the 21st Century
item.description:
Bitcoin is the Automobile 'Menace' of the 21st Century

The early automobile was certainly the disruptive technology of its time. In fact, we can learn a lot about today's Bitcoin industry by observing how the nascent car industry was able to overcome many obstacles to become today's dominant form of transport.

item.title: Is there a lot of innovative blockchain activity in Russia?
item.description:
Is there a lot of innovative blockchain activity in Russia?

Answer: Cryptocurrencies are currently illegal in Russia, so I would assume there is very little. Though with that said, its only blockchains of the public form that are illegal, so there very well might be a lot of innovation in the private blockchain industry, but i doubt it.

item.title: Is it illegal for commercial software to run a Bitcoin mine in the background?
item.description:
Is it illegal for commercial software to run a Bitcoin mine in the background?

Answer: I'm sure it would be frowned upon, but it wouldn't be illegal if it was disclosed. A few companies have tried this, one in particular was Pando. Pando shipped their Media Booster software with some games, including the popular League of Legends. What Pando's software did for League of Le...

item.title: How is the first ever bitcoin mined, when there is no bitcoin in system to transact?
item.description:
How is the first ever bitcoin mined, when there is no bitcoin in system to transact?

Answer (1 of 2): The Genesis block - (Bitcoin Wiki) was hard coded as the first block in the blockchain. > Here is a representation of the genesis block as it appeared in a comment in an old version of Bitcoin (line 1613). The first section defines exactly all of the variables necessary to recr...

item.title: Uber has found a clever way to bypass a roadblock in Argentina involving bitcoin
item.description:
Uber has found a clever way to bypass a roadblock in Argentina involving bitcoin

Uber is facing strong opposition in Buenos Aires, where the company has been operating since mid-April without a permit or tax-identification number. The massively funded startup is being sued by taxi unions. City officials have issued multiple injunctions attempting to bring its service to a halt.

item.title: Coinbase Suspends Canadian Dollar Services Amid $10.5M Raise From Bank of Tokyo-Mitsubishi UFJ
item.description:
Coinbase Suspends Canadian Dollar Services Amid $10.5M Raise From Bank of Tokyo-Mitsubishi UFJ

San Francisco-based Coinbase, a leading Bitcoin exchange offering numerous services and products, has informed its Canadian users they must liquidate their CAD holdings by July 29th. "As of August 1, Coinbase's Canadian payments provider, Vogogo, will be shutting down its payment processing business," Coinbase stated in an email to users seen by Bitcoin Magazine.

item.description:
Are you addicted to Bitcoin? It's ok you can admit it. * /r/Bitcoin

Are you addicted to Bitcoin? I will admit I am. Every day I am reading more about Bitcoin and watching videos on YouTube as well as talking about...

item.title: A startup is trying solve bitcoin's child pornography problem
item.description:
A startup is trying solve bitcoin's child pornography problem

Bitcoin, a currency with the promise of anonymity and no government regulation, is a potential hotbed for nefarious activities. On Wednesday (July 6), London-based bitcoin startup Elliptic announced that it was teaming up with International Watch Foundation (IWF), a non-profit in the UK that monitors online child abuse, to curb the cryptocurrency's role in the spread of child...

item.title: Coinbase Raises Investment, Eyes the Japanese Market - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Coinbase Raises Investment, Eyes the Japanese Market - NEWSBTC

Coinbase has announced its strategic partnership with a Japanese financial institution and its intentions to enter the Japanese market. Read more... Coinbase, the leading cryptocurrency company has today announced its partnership with a leading Japanese financial institution, Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc. (NYSE : MTU).
